short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display the GitHub notifications list in a popover instead of navigating to a new page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instead of navigating to a new page, this extension intercepts the click action on the notification bell icon in GitHub and instead renders the list of notifications in a popover.
